wasarin dekin aandu peralanawa nam eeka 'apuru' wihiluwakya.1947 maha mathiwaranayedi kisima pakshayak pahadili bahutharayak gaththe natha. 1952 marthu masaye agamathi dhurayata path nawa agamathi dadli senanayaka mahatha masak athulatha maha mathiwaranayak pawathwa thunen deke bahutharayak labagaththeya.

ee katayuthu soya bala, salasum sampadanaya kara kriyathmaka karanna thawa awurudu gananawak yanawa.onna ookayi thathwaya.anthimata subha lalaka thissatath wune blak lebal shot ekak dagena prashna amathaka karala dannayi.me kathawen apata ugatha haki padam bohoyi.awurudu ganak thisse pawathagena ena dewal patas gala wenas karanna baha.wenasak karanna kalin pawathina kramaye siyalu muhunath hondin adhyanaya karala karanna puluwan wenas kam thiranaya kala yuthuyi.adala siyalu parshawayan ge adahas soya baliya yuthuyi.
api dennek gaha gaththa kiyala khanija thel mila thiranaya karanna baha.

dashakayedi shri lanka jathika krikat kandayamata ekwa me wana thek krida kala awasan kridakaya wana thilakarathna dilshan ada(28) siya ekdina jathyanthara krikat pitiyen samuganimata niyamithaya.ada paswaruwe ostreliyawa samaga dambaulla jathyanthara kridanganayedi pawathwena tharagaya dilshange awasan ekdina tharagayayi.1999 wasaredi simbabwe kandayamata erehiwa ekdina pitiyata piwisi thilakarathna dilshan me wana wita ekdina jathyanthara tharaga 329kata sahabhagi wi lakunu 10,248k raskaragena sitiyi.eeta shathaka 22 k saha ardha shathaka 47 k athulathya.dilshan ekdina krikat pitiye wadima lakunu labagath kridakayin athara 11 wana sthanaye pasuweyi.pandu yawimen kadulu 106k dawa gena athi dilshan pandu rakimen da wishesha dakshatha dakwanneku lesa prasiddhiyata pathwa sitiyi.hisata ihalin ena panduwata pahara demin amuthuma aakaraye paharak ella karamin krikat pothata dilskup yana nama ek kirimata da ti.em dilshan samath wuni.ti.em dilshange samuganima wenuwen wishesha wadasatahan kihipayak sanwidhanaya kirimata shri lanka krikat aayathanaya piyawara gena athi athara ohuta gaurawayak washayen ada tharagaya jayaganima apekshawa bawa nayaka anjalo mathiws sandahan kara atha.
